Suspecting the wheelchair-bound Crown Prince Jiang Yunsheng, she marries into his household to investigate. As they work together, misunderstandings fade, and they join forces to solve mysteries and ultimately uncover the truth, united by their shared quest for justice.

title: Northward
description: The story revolves around several boys and girls who grew up together along the canal, after leaving to make their own growth, reunite after many years. After experiencing competition and the pressures of life, they rediscover the hope for a new life.
descriptionAr: The story revolves around several boys and girls who grew up together along the canal, after leaving to make their own growth, reunite after many years. After experiencing competition and the pressures of life, they rediscover the hope for a new life.

title: The Potato Lab
description: تتخذ حياة باحثة شغوفة منعطفًا مفاجئًا عندما يصل مدير صارم جديد إلى مختبر البطاطس الذي تعمل فيه... ويتضح أنّ الحب قد يزهر في أكثر الأماكن غير المتوقعة.
descriptionAr: تتخذ حياة باحثة شغوفة منعطفًا مفاجئًا عندما يصل مدير صارم جديد إلى مختبر البطاطس الذي تعمل فيه... ويتضح أنّ الحب قد يزهر في أكثر الأماكن غير المتوقعة.

title: Si Jin
description: Jiang Si, the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin. Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement, outsmarts her cruel aunt, opens a perfumery, and investigates a series of mysterious crimes. She reunites with Yu Jin, and despite their unresolved past, they join forces to change tragic destinies—saving her siblings and clearing her father’s name. As they overcome hardships together, Jiang Si’s feelings for Yu Jin rekindle, and they work hand in hand to protect the peace of the Zhou dynasty, embracing a lifetime of prosperity.
descriptionAr: Jiang Si, the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin. Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement, outsmarts her cruel aunt, opens a perfumery, and investigates a series of mysterious crimes. She reunites with Yu Jin, and despite their unresolved past, they join forces to change tragic destinies—saving her siblings and clearing her father’s name. As they overcome hardships together, Jiang Si’s feelings for Yu Jin rekindle, and they work hand in hand to protect the peace of the Zhou dynasty, embracing a lifetime of prosperity.

title: The Source of River
description: Years after a personal and professional setback, tax investigator Zheng Hao is assigned to expose a major tax evasion network in Xindong. As his former fiancée, Liang Jinqiu, returns from abroad and their old friend, Professor Zhao Mingda, faces a family crisis, they become entangled in a dangerous fight against corruption and deception hidden beneath the city’s facade.

As his former fiancée, Liang Jinqiu, returns from abroad and their old friend, Professor Zhao Mingda, faces a family crisis, they become entangled in a dangerous fight against corruption and deception hidden beneath the city’s facade.

title: Dalah: Death and the Flowers
description: حين يموت عميلها في ليلة زفافه، تنطلق بائعة زهور بحثًا عن القاتل لتكشف في خضم ذلك أسرار الطبقة الراقية المظلمة... فيما تُبقي أسرارها هي طيّ الكتمان.
descriptionAr: حين يموت عميلها في ليلة زفافه، تنطلق بائعة زهور بحثًا عن القاتل لتكشف في خضم ذلك أسرار الطبقة الراقية المظلمة... فيما تُبقي أسرارها هي طيّ الكتمان.

title: Love and Sword
description: Fang Yi, an ordinary city dweller, accidentally falls into a martial arts world, expecting adventure and heroism. Instead, she encounters Rong Shuang, a once-great swordsman now struggling with lost skills. Rescued by the ruthless bounty hunter Yan Shao, she is taken to the enigmatic Yuchi Manor, where she discovers a world filled with intrigue and hidden emotions.
descriptionAr: Fang Yi, an ordinary city dweller, accidentally falls into a martial arts world, expecting adventure and heroism. Instead, she encounters Rong Shuang, a once-great swordsman now struggling with lost skills. Rescued by the ruthless bounty hunter Yan Shao, she is taken to the enigmatic Yuchi Manor, where she discovers a world filled with intrigue and hidden emotions.

title: Hell for You
description: Seeking revenge after being framed for murder 14 years ago, Sachiko changes her appearance and infiltrates a popular influencer's home as a babysitter.
descriptionAr: Seeking revenge after being framed for murder 14 years ago, Sachiko changes her appearance and infiltrates a popular influencer's home as a babysitter.

title: Filter
description: The "Filter Bracelet" allows Su Chengcheng to transform her appearance and use her new identities to help others. As she navigates these changes, she and Tang Qi work together to develop a unique Chinese beauty brand, promoting "natural, confident, real beauty." Through their journey, Su Chengcheng learns that true beauty lies in authenticity and facing challenges with determination.

Through their journey, Su Chengcheng learns that true beauty lies in authenticity and facing challenges with determination.

title: The Best Thing
description: Suffering from insomnia and migraines, Shen Xifan consults a traditional Chinese medicine doctor, He Suye. As their lives intersect, an unexpected romance blossoms.
descriptionAr: Suffering from insomnia and migraines, Shen Xifan consults a traditional Chinese medicine doctor, He Suye. As their lives intersect, an unexpected romance blossoms.

title: Bound by Sin
description: Jiang Yingxian, the second daughter of the Jiang family, defies societal norms by taking over the family business. She hires Fu Cheng, a principled but low-born man with his own hidden agenda, as her personal bodyguard. Despite their differences, a forbidden romance blossoms. However, as she faces an arranged marriage and he enlists in the army, their love is tested by duty, ambition, and the chaos of their nation.
descriptionAr: Jiang Yingxian, the second daughter of the Jiang family, defies societal norms by taking over the family business. However, as she faces an arranged marriage and he enlists in the army, their love is tested by duty, ambition, and the chaos of their nation.

title: Jirisan
description: A team of expert mountain rangers put their lives on the line to save stranded trekkers, solve haunting mysteries and protect Jirisan National Park.
descriptionAr: A team of expert mountain rangers put their lives on the line to save stranded trekkers, solve haunting mysteries and protect Jirisan National Park.

title: Ghost Doctor
description: الدراما تدور حول طبيبين شديدي الاختلاف من حيث المهارة والشخصية ولكن يتبادلان الاجساد اثر حادث فتسكن روح كل منهما جسد الاخر.
descriptionAr: الدراما تدور حول طبيبين شديدي الاختلاف من حيث المهارة والشخصية ولكن يتبادلان الاجساد اثر حادث فتسكن روح كل منهما جسد الاخر.

title: Buried Hearts
description: للنجاة بنفسه، يضطر مُعاون شاب يُخفي جشعه وراء قناع الولاء والطاعة إلى تنفيذ عملية اختراق لسرقة أموال غير مشروعة تناهز الـ 2 تريليون وون من صاحبها الأوسع نفوذًا والأشد بطشًا في البلاد، والذي عندما يُدرك خسارته يطلع العنان لوحشيته ويندلع صراع مصيري لا يقبل القسمة على اثنين.
descriptionAr: للنجاة بنفسه، يضطر مُعاون شاب يُخفي جشعه وراء قناع الولاء والطاعة إلى تنفيذ عملية اختراق لسرقة أموال غير مشروعة تناهز الـ 2 تريليون وون من صاحبها الأوسع نفوذًا والأشد بطشًا في البلاد، والذي عندما يُدرك خسارته يطلع العنان لوحشيته ويندلع صراع مصيري لا يقبل القسمة على اثنين.

title: The Good Detective
description: A drama about the race between people who want to get closer to the truth and those who want to cover it up. Jang Seung Jo will take on the role of Oh Ji Hyuk, an elite detective of nine years who does not share his feelings with others due to pain he experienced when he was young. He is not swayed by money and power, even with the huge wealth he inherited from his uncle.

Jang Seung Jo will take on the role of Oh Ji Hyuk, an elite detective of nine years who does not share his feelings with others due to pain he experienced when he was young. He is not swayed by money and power, even with the huge wealth he inherited from his uncle.

title: My Dearest Nemesis
description: قائدة فريق مجتهدة تنقلب حياتها رأسًا على عقب بتعيين مدير جديد لقسمها والذي ارتبط بأسوء ذكرى محرجة في حياتها والملقّب بـ “التنين الأسود“، فهل سيظل يطاردهما شبح الماضي والضغائن أم سيكون للقدر حُكم آخر؟

title: The First Frost
description: Wen Yifan, by chance, ends up living with her high school classmate Sang Yan, whom she once rejected. They keep their distance until Wen Yifan learns from Sang Yan that she sleepwalks, intertwining their lives once more.
descriptionAr: Wen Yifan, by chance, ends up living with her high school classmate Sang Yan, whom she once rejected. They keep their distance until Wen Yifan learns from Sang Yan that she sleepwalks, intertwining their lives once more.

title: Doctor Cha
description: Twenty years after leaving her medical career, a housewife returns as a first-year resident — struggling to find her footing in a job full of surprises.
descriptionAr: Twenty years after leaving her medical career, a housewife returns as a first-year resident — struggling to find her footing in a job full of surprises.

title: What Comes After Love
description: تقع شابة كورية في حب شاب ياباني أثناء بعثتها الدراسية باليابان لكن تنتهي قصة حبّهما بالانفصال، بعد مرور سنوات يتصادفان من جديد لكن في كوريا هذه المرة... فهل سيكتبان فصل جديد من قصّة حبها؟ أم ما عاد للحب بقيّة؟.
descriptionAr: تقع شابة كورية في حب شاب ياباني أثناء بعثتها الدراسية باليابان لكن تنتهي قصة حبّهما بالانفصال، بعد مرور سنوات يتصادفان من جديد لكن في كوريا هذه المرة... فهل سيكتبان فصل جديد من قصّة حبها؟ أم ما عاد للحب بقيّة؟.

title: Today's Webtoon
description: The story is about a woman who struggles together with her coworkers to mature into a true webtoon editor after joining the webtoon editorial department. On Ma Eum, who enters the webtoon editorial department after beating all odds. She has a large appetite, a great sense of smell, and cauliflower ears typical of a fighter as a former standing member for the judo national team. On Ma Eum had to quit her athletic career when an unfortunate accident during a match tore her ankle ligament, but she begins to dream anew when she coincidentally delivers food to the webtoon editorial department.

title: The Villain of Romance
description: A coming-of-age story and realistic romance about young college “villains” who are still learning about love.
descriptionAr: A coming-of-age story and realistic romance about young college “villains” who are still learning about love.

title: Serendipity's Embrace
description: عشق بريء في ريعان الشباب يُحطّم جناحيها ويهوى بقلبها على مذبح القدر، وما دبّت فيه الحياة إلّا بمضيّ عقد من الزمان، بلمّ شملها مع الحبيب، فهل سيكون نبض حبّ جديد يحرّك المياه الراكدة؟ أم نبض لبركان غضب من جرح غائر لم تداوه دوامّة الحياة؟
descriptionAr: عشق بريء في ريعان الشباب يُحطّم جناحيها ويهوى بقلبها على مذبح القدر، وما دبّت فيه الحياة إلّا بمضيّ عقد من الزمان، بلمّ شملها مع الحبيب، فهل سيكون نبض حبّ جديد يحرّك المياه الراكدة؟ أم نبض لبركان غضب من جرح غائر لم تداوه دوامّة الحياة؟

title: Seasons of Blossom
description:
A story of love and friendship between five high school students from Seoyeon High School.

Lee Ha-Min (Seo Ji-Hoon) appears like a bright person, but there is also darkness within his mind. Han So-Mang ( So Ju-Yeon) is a warm-hearted person, but she is also quite timid. Lee Jae-Min (Kim Min-Kyu) is a popular student with a painful past. He is kind to everyone around him. Yoon Bo-Mi (Kang Hye-Won) is a sweet, model student. Choi Jin-Young (Yoon Hyun-Soo) loves playing games. He can seem unfriendly and has a delicate personality.

title: City of Romance
description: Bai Xiaoduo, accustomed to protecting herself with lies due to her low self-esteem, meets Su Yancheng, a genius cartoonist who despises dishonesty. Despite their differences, they support each other through a series of events, gradually healing one another's inner wounds.
descriptionAr: Bai Xiaoduo, accustomed to protecting herself with lies due to her low self-esteem, meets Su Yancheng, a genius cartoonist who despises dishonesty. Despite their differences, they support each other through a series of events, gradually healing one another's inner wounds.

title: Les Belles
description: Luo Lingyu, a fallen noblewoman, travels to Yuezhou with her sister to seek refuge. On the way, she rescues a destitute man but later forces him to jump overboard due to societal norms. Unaware that the Lu family's third young master is the man she pushed into the water, she tries to win his favor—only to be repeatedly thwarted. He watches her struggle, exposing her every move, yet when she turns to someone else, he refuses to let her go!

title: Melo Movie
description: يقع عاشق أفلام في غرام مُخرجة طامحة، وتشتعل بينهما علاقة رومانسية سرعان ما ينطفئ لهيبها... ولكن هل يجد هذا الحب سبيلًا إلى قلبيهما مجددًا عندما تتلاقى خطاهما مرة أخرى؟

title: I Am Married...But!
description: عندما يتحول لقاء لطيف إلى قصة حب عاصفة، يتعين على ثنائي خوض غمار الواقع الفوضوي للحياة الزوجية التي لا تشبه مطلقًا نهاية القصص الخيالية.

title: Phantom School
description: Nestled quietly in the heart of a buzzing community, there sits a school that to any who might pass it by, appears to be quite normal. However, as is often the case, looks can be quite deceiving. Inhabited by several malicious phantoms, this school plays host to more than its dedicated faculty and lively student body.

title: Perfect Marriage Revenge
description: تستيقظ "هان يي جو" من حادث مميت لتجد نفسها في الماضي، وتتعاون مع "سيو دو غوك" للانتقام من العائلة التي لم تحبها أبدًا.
descriptionAr: تستيقظ "هان يي جو" من حادث مميت لتجد نفسها في الماضي، وتتعاون مع "سيو دو غوك" للانتقام من العائلة التي لم تحبها أبدًا.

title: Not Others
description: Eun-mi is just like any other woman her age, with the exception that she gave birth to her daughter, Jin-hee, while she was in high school. Living under the same roof as Eun-mi is no different for Jin-hee than raising her own daughter, and it's often difficult to determine who plays the role of the mother. Despite their roommate-like conflicts, deep down they know they can rely on each other when things get a little too chaotic. As a fresh day begins, Eun-mi and Jin-hee step into another day of their remarkable journey, where the ordinary becomes extraordinary in their uniquely intertwined lives.

title: Night Has Come
description: يجب على طلاب مدرسة Yoo-il High، المحاصرين في "لعبة المافيا" الملعونة القاتلة، أن يلعبوا اللعبة من أجل البقاء على قيد الحياة، بينما يقومون بكشف الألغاز وراء اللعنة.

title: My Happy Ending
description: سيو جاي وون الذي عانى من طفولة مؤسفة، أصبح مديرًا تنفيذيًا طموحًا ومندفعًا يسعى وراء النجاح. ولكن عندما يخرج هوسها عن السيطرة، تحاول الهروب من رغباتها غير الصحية، لكن زوجها، المصمم والأستاذ الجامعي، ينجرف في هذه العملية.

title: Love Is for Suckers
description: A romantic comedy-drama depicting the sweet and salty reality romance between 20-year-old best friends in their 30s who have no romance or flirting.
descriptionAr: A romantic comedy-drama depicting the sweet and salty reality romance between 20-year-old best friends in their 30s who have no romance or flirting.

title: Love in Contract
description: Contract marriage master Choi Sang-eun's alternate day romance with a long-term mystery client on Monday, Wednesday and Friday and a new superstar client on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.
descriptionAr: Contract marriage master Choi Sang-eun's alternate day romance with a long-term mystery client on Monday, Wednesday and Friday and a new superstar client on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.

title: Dear.M
description: Campus life at Seoyeon University has always been relatively peaceful, but when an anonymous post pops up on the school’s online community, the entire campus is flipped upside down.
descriptionAr: Campus life at Seoyeon University has always been relatively peaceful, but when an anonymous post pops up on the school’s online community, the entire campus is flipped upside down.

title: A Korean Odyssey
description: إنه مخلوق وحيد يعتمد على نفسه للخلود، لكنّ مسعاه ينقلب عليه حين يجد نفسه تحت رحمة امرأة تستطيع رؤية مخلوقات من عوالم أخرى.

title: Gaus Electronics
description: The series is about the office workers of Marketing Team 3 at the home appliance headquarters of Gaus Electronics—a multinational company. It highlights the highs and lows of corporate life, and love and friendship between the employees.
descriptionAr: The series is about the office workers of Marketing Team 3 at the home appliance headquarters of Gaus Electronics—a multinational company. It highlights the highs and lows of corporate life, and love and friendship between the employees.

title: Face Me
description: لاستعادة سمعته المتضررة يتطوّع طبيب طوارئ سابق وجرّاح تجميلي حالي في إجراء عمليات تجميلية لضحايا جرائم العنف، لكن نظرًا لمهارته الخارقة في التشريح ينخرط مع محققة شغوفة في حلّ القضايا حتّى يصطدما في النهاية في القضية الغامضة التي غيّرت حياته ليعصف به ماضٍ أليم حاوله جاهدًا دفنه.

title: Brain Works
description: تدور قصة الدرما حول رجلين كالأقطاب المُتنافرة لا يطيقان بعضهما البعض لكن تضطرهما الأقدار للتعاون لحل قضية غامضة تتعلق بمرض دماغي نادر، فإذا اجتمع طبيب أعصاب بـ “عقلية عبقرية“ ومحقق بـ “عقلية إيثارية وطبيبة شرعية في التنويم المغناطيسي ذات “عقلية قلوقة“، هل سينجحون في كشف غموض القضية؟

title: Bad Prosecutor
description: الدراما تصور قصة المدعي العام الذي يعاقب حقا السلطات الفاسدة بالحيلة والخداع. جين جونغ يعمل كمدعي عام. يعتمد أحيانًا على المكائد والخداع، بدلاً من الممارسات القانونية المعيارية. في الوقت نفسه، لديه إحساس عميق بالعدالة والضمير. حيث سيقف إلى جانب الضعيف ويحارب الأشرار ويطبق سياسة العين بالعين. وفي الوقت نفسه، شين إي ري تكون كبيرة المدعين العامين في مكتب مدعي المنطقة المركزية تتمتع بمهارات عمل ومهارات اجتماعية مثالية.

title: The Last Empress
description: In an alternate-reality South Korea, where a constitutional monarchical system prevails, Oh Sunny, a musical actress, becomes the empress of the country. Thus begins a dispute for power in the royal palace. Nothing is what it seems, and Oh Sunny is ready to fight until the end to uncover a mysterious homicide within the royal palace, fighting to protect those she loves the most and obtain happiness.

title: The Midnight Romance in Hagwon
description: تحت جنح ليل حيّ دايتشي بانطفاء أضواء إحدى الأكاديميّات تضيء شمعة حبّ سريّ بين مُعلمّة مخضرمة و وطالبها السابق المُشاكس الذي عاد على أجنحة شوق والحنين ليزلزل كيانها ناسجًا قصّة رومانسية تشرق عند منتصف الليل، فهل سينال مراده وتقع في شباك سحره بعد أن أمسى زميل لها في الأكاديمية الآن؟

title: The Escape of the Seven
description: سبعة اشخاص أشرار متورطين في قضية فتاة مفقودة، يواجهون احداث ضخمة متشابكة مع العديد من الأكاذيب والرغبات. ستصور الدراما أيضاً رحلة البحث عن الحقيقة، وكذلك الانتقام الدموي الذي يشبه العقوبة الإلهية.

title: For Eagle Brothers
description: اربعة إخوة من أعمار متفاوتة يعيشون تحت سقف واحد ملتفين حول زوجة أخيهم الراحل والتي باتت المعيلة الوحيدة للأسرة، بتشابك قصصهم وبدخول حب جديد إلى حياتها كيف ستتعقد حيواتهم؟

title: The Embers
description: A childhood massacre changes the course of the Liao brothers' lives. Once close and partners in solving cases, they are now torn between self-redemption and revenge, facing off on opposite sides of good and evil.
descriptionAr: A childhood massacre changes the course of the Liao brothers' lives. Once close and partners in solving cases, they are now torn between self-redemption and revenge, facing off on opposite sides of good and evil.

title: Kill My Sins
description: The story follows Ye Ping'an, a heart doctor who arrives in Shengdu to investigate an old case. Rumors spread that she manipulates hearts and minds, earning her the title of "witch." When a sudden murder occurs, she's accused of the crime. Yuan Shaocheng, an ambitious official, realizes there's more to the case yet still seeks to have her executed. But Ye Ping'an has already made her first move on the path to vengeance.

title: Who Saw the Peacock Dance in the Jungle?
description: بعد مقتل والدها الشرطي السابق عشية عيد الميلاد المجيد، تعثر "كوموغي" على رسالة تشير إلى مؤامرة غامضة، وتوحّد جهودها مع محامٍ للكشف عن الحقيقة.

title: Newtopia
description: المُجند الذي التحق متأخرًا بالجيش ”جاي يون“ وحبيبته ”يونغ جو“ ينفصلان عبر الهاتف بسبب خلافاتهما المتزايدة. لكن تفشي الأحياء الأموات يقلب الموازين. يتم إعلان حالة الطوارئ الوطنية، وتتحطم طائرة في مركز المدينة، فيعلق ”جاي يون“ ووحدته على قمة ناطحة سحاب في ”سول“. تخاطر ”يونغ جو“ بحياتها في الشوارع المليئة بالأحياء الأموات لإيجاده. هل يستطيع حبهما النجاة في هذه الكارثة؟

title: Love of the Divine Tree
description: Su Yishui, a talented young cultivator, had his destiny changed by his master Mu Qingge eighteen years ago. Mu Qingge, known as the "female demon," was also branded with a bad reputation and presumed dead. Eighteen years later, Mu Qingge transforms into Xue Ranran, and Su Yishui, now the head of the West Mountain Sect, takes the critically ill Ranran as his disciple, vowing to protect her for life. Thus, the roles of master and disciple are swapped, and various amusing and unusual stories unfold between them.

title: Taxi Driver
description: تدور احداث مسلسل سائق سيارة أجرة عن كيم دو كي خريج الأكاديمية البحرية قُتلت والدته على يد قاتل متسلسل وتغيرت حياته بعد ذلك. كيم دو كي يعمل الآن كسائق تاكسي لصالح شركة “رينبو تاكسي”. شركة رينبو تاكسي ليست مجرد شركة سيارات أجرة عادية. حيث تقوم الشركة بتقديم خدمة خاصة اسمها “دعوة للانتقام”. أي إذا طلب منهم أحد العملاء الانتقام له ، فسيقوم كيم دو كي وزملاؤه بأداء الخدمة.

title: Golden Kamuy -The Hunt of Prisoners in Hokkaido-
description: With two map pieces secured, Sugimoto ans Asirpa continue their hunt for the remaining 22 tattooed convicts whose bodies hold the key to hidden treasure.
descriptionAr: With two map pieces secured, Sugimoto ans Asirpa continue their hunt for the remaining 22 tattooed convicts whose bodies hold the key to hidden treasure.

title: My Lovely Liar
description: A woman who can't trust people because of her ability to hear lies and a mystic composer who hid his indescribable identity, become involved in each other's lives to uncover the truth.
descriptionAr: A woman who can't trust people because of her ability to hear lies and a mystic composer who hid his indescribable identity, become involved in each other's lives to uncover the truth.

title: Love with Flaws
description: هذه الدراما عن امرأة تكره الفتيان الوسيمين ورجل مهووس بالمظاهر وهما يتغلبان على حكمهما المسبق. لي كانج وو شاب وسيم يستمتع بكونه محط الاهتمام، في ماضيه تعرض للهجر لكونه قبيح المظهر، منذ تلك اللحظة وهو مهووس بمظهره، في هذه الأثناء جو سو يون معلمة تربية رياضية متحمسة، لا تحب الرجال الوسيمين لأنها مرت بمشاكل عديدة بسبب إخوتها الثلاثة الوسيمين، فتى أحلامها هو شخص عادي، حدث أن التقى لي كانج وو بجو سو ي…

title: Good Partner
description: دراما محكمة إنسانية باردة وساخنة بين تشا إيون كيونج ، المحامية المشهورة التي يعتبر طلاقها هو دعوتها، وهان يو ري، المحامية الجديدة التي يعتبر طلاقها هو المرة الأولى التي تتزوج فيها.

title: Bitter Sweet Hell
description: مستشارة نفسية شهيرة، تتصدع حياتها المثالية حبن اجتاحتها عشيقة زوجها الغامضة، لحماية الأسرة من الانهيار، تترك أمّها في القانون المناكشات جانبًا، وتحدد معها يدًا بيد، في هذا الجحيم الحلو والمر، هل ستحجان في تحويله إلى النعيم من جديد؟

title: A Good Day to be a Dog
description: Hae-na who is bound to inherit her family curse which is turning into a dog after getting her first kiss. The only way to break the curse is to get a second kiss. The problem is the guy who gave Hae-na her first kiss is afraid of dogs.
descriptionAr: Hae-na who is bound to inherit her family curse which is turning into a dog after getting her first kiss. The only way to break the curse is to get a second kiss. The problem is the guy who gave Hae-na her first kiss is afraid of dogs.

title: Back for You
description: In the early Republic of China, police officer A Lai is saved by a mysterious woman, Lu Na, who falls into a coma. Using her comic books, he solves cases and uncovers clues about her past, all while facing rising dangers linked to his newfound success.
descriptionAr: In the early Republic of China, police officer A Lai is saved by a mysterious woman, Lu Na, who falls into a coma. Using her comic books, he solves cases and uncovers clues about her past, all while facing rising dangers linked to his newfound success.

title: The White Olive Tree
description:
During an interview mission in the turbulent East Country, Song Ran, a female reporter from Liangcheng Satellite TV, came across a sudden danger. Thankfully, Li Zan, a Chinese explosive engineer who volunteered in the East Country, was able to save her. After multiple interactions, Li Zan discovered that despite appearing weak on the outside, Song Ran was brave, strong, and full of justice and kindness. The same ideals and compatible souls ignited the love between them.

A sudden bombing attack ended their budding relationship, and they fell into a trough of life after returning to China and even losing contact with each other. By chance, they came across each other again, and gradually, their lives got back on track. Together, they planted the seeds of the white olive tree.

title: Devil's Diner
description: في ركن ناءٍ من المدينة، يقدِّم طاهٍ غامض وجبات ساحرة تحقق أعمق رغبات ضيوفه؛ شرط أن يكونوا مستعدين لدفع الثمن.

title: Perfect Match
description: In the bustling capital of Bianjing during the Northern Song Dynasty, Madam Li moves her family in search of better marriage prospects for her five beautiful but quirky daughters, whose love lives have long been her worry. Each daughter, though famous for her beauty and wit, comes with unique quirks: the eldest, Shou Hua, has no interest in remarrying after early widowhood; the third, Kang Ning, is fierce and headstrong; the fourth, Hao De, is well-meaning but blunt; and the youngest, Le Shan, is spoiled and selective.  Challenges abound as they face unexpected setbacks, including a cold reception from the already-married sister they came to visit. As the family reestablishes their business, they navigate a series of humorous and heartwarming misadventures, ultimately finding love and fulfilling their mother’s hopes in this lively tale of family and romance.

title: Reopen My Journals
description: 15-year-old Qian Jiayue enters a prestigious high school and faces academic challenges while navigating friendships and family dynamics. As she bonds with her new friend Chen Mo, both girls grow through their shared experiences. Meanwhile, their families grapple with life changes and generational conflicts, but the warmth of family and community support remains unchanged.

title: The Trauma Code: Heroes on Call
description: من أجل إنشاء مركز متخصّص في علاج الصدمات الخطيرة، يصل طبيب حروب مخضرم مع أساليبه الحادة والمتمرّسة لتحويل فريقه إلى منقذين متفرّدين.

title: Study Group
description: وسط مدرسة مهنية شائنة السمعة، يشعّ طالب مهندب بنظارات منكبًّا على كُتبه وكأنّه الطالب النموذجيّ والحسنة الوحيدة لهذه المدرسة لكنّه في الحقيقة طالب بليد ويكبح بداخله وحش شرس لا يقبل المساس بأعضاء مجموعته الدراسية.

title: Missing: The Other Side
description: يواجه أحد المحتالين قريةً خارقةً للطبيعة تَعلق بها أرواح أشخاص مفقودة، إلى أن يُحلّ اللغز وراء اختفائهم.

title: Too Young to Grow Old
description: Former rebel Song Chen, inspired by his mentor, becomes a teacher dedicated to helping students overcome their struggles. Partnered with the spirited but reluctant Tan Shutong, he faces the challenges of teaching while bridging generational divides. Together with their students and peers, they embark on a journey of growth, questioning what it truly means to become the adults they hope to be.
descriptionAr: Former rebel Song Chen, inspired by his mentor, becomes a teacher dedicated to helping students overcome their struggles. Partnered with the spirited but reluctant Tan Shutong, he faces the challenges of teaching while bridging generational divides. Together with their students and peers, they embark on a journey of growth, questioning what it truly means to become the adults they hope to be.

title: Everlasting Longing
description:
When the business prodigy meets a domineering man, their story begins. The eldest daughter of a merchant family has been living with two identities. To outsiders, Jun Qiluo is Jun Feifan, the illegitimate son of the family. She was taken to Beixuan at the age of 20 years old.

Jun Qiluo experiences many hardships in a foreign land. She is accused of being a spy, humiliated, and mistreated. Qiluo finds a chance to escape but discovers that while she is away from home, the prince has colluded with her brother-in-law and his mistress to steal their family fortune. Jun Qiluo takes her aging father, erniang, and two younger sisters with her as she fights to rebuild the family business.
descriptionAr:
When the business prodigy meets a domineering man, their story begins. The eldest daughter of a merchant family has been living with two identities. To outsiders, Jun Qiluo is Jun Feifan, the illegitimate son of the family. She was taken to Beixuan at the age of 20 years old.

Jun Qiluo experiences many hardships in a foreign land. She is accused of being a spy, humiliated, and mistreated. Jun Qiluo takes her aging father, erniang, and two younger sisters with her as she fights to rebuild the family business.

title: Okura: Cold Case Investigation
description: In a department known as “Okura” where misfits assemble, a pair of detectives with a generational gap work together, using the slightest clues to get closer to the truth behind each case.
descriptionAr: In a department known as “Okura” where misfits assemble, a pair of detectives with a generational gap work together, using the slightest clues to get closer to the truth behind each case.

title: Live or Love?
description: Rivals Fang Li and An Hang accidentally get trapped in a virtual world, becoming a married couple. With opposing system missions, they must defeat each other to return to reality. As they battle it out, they start to fall for each other. Can they rewrite the system's rules and find a way out?
descriptionAr: Rivals Fang Li and An Hang accidentally get trapped in a virtual world, becoming a married couple. With opposing system missions, they must defeat each other to return to reality. As they battle it out, they start to fall for each other. Can they rewrite the system's rules and find a way out?

title: Drifting Away
description: That winter, a horrific crime left veteran police captain Peng Zhaolin deeply shaken. A decade earlier, he had unknowingly crossed paths with the suspect, Deng Ligang, missing a crucial chance to stop the crime spree. Despite a relentless pursuit, the criminals vanished without a trace. Years later, a new clue emerges, prompting Peng Zhaolin and young officer Zhen Zhen to reopen the case and seek justice for the victims.
descriptionAr: That winter, a horrific crime left veteran police captain Peng Zhaolin deeply shaken. A decade earlier, he had unknowingly crossed paths with the suspect, Deng Ligang, missing a crucial chance to stop the crime spree. Despite a relentless pursuit, the criminals vanished without a trace. Years later, a new clue emerges, prompting Peng Zhaolin and young officer Zhen Zhen to reopen the case and seek justice for the victims.

title: Stolen Love
description: The young and dashing general Xiao Chuyi and his childhood sweetheart, Lu Yunxi, share a deep and loving relationship. However, after Xiao Chuyi's exile and near-death experience, he returns to find that Lu Yunxi has moved on. Amid tangled emotions of love and hatred, Xiao Chuyi and Lu Yunxi navigate a complex and forbidden romance as their feelings become increasingly entangled.
descriptionAr: The young and dashing general Xiao Chuyi and his childhood sweetheart, Lu Yunxi, share a deep and loving relationship. However, after Xiao Chuyi's exile and near-death experience, he returns to find that Lu Yunxi has moved on. Amid tangled emotions of love and hatred, Xiao Chuyi and Lu Yunxi navigate a complex and forbidden romance as their feelings become increasingly entangled.

title: May Your Heart Be Like Mine
description: Xie Tianxing, a chivalrous thief from a fallen noble family, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a new life when he takes on a mission that leads to him assuming the identity of a wealthy merchant. As he navigates his sudden transformation, he discovers that beneath his newfound fortune, danger and deception lurk at every turn.

title: Unmasked
description: ي سيول الحديثة، يكافح فريق من الصحفيين الاستقصائيين من أجل حياتهم المهنية بعد بث قصة مثيرة للجدل. ومع نفاد الوقت، يُكلف الفريق بمهمة مستحيلة إذا أرادوا إنقاذ وظائفهم - حل قضية باردة عمرها عشرين عامًا تتعلق بممثل مشهور اختفى دون أثر.
descriptionAr: ي سيول الحديثة، يكافح فريق من الصحفيين الاستقصائيين من أجل حياتهم المهنية بعد بث قصة مثيرة للجدل. ومع نفاد الوقت، يُكلف الفريق بمهمة مستحيلة إذا أرادوا إنقاذ وظائفهم - حل قضية باردة عمرها عشرين عامًا تتعلق بممثل مشهور اختفى دون أثر.

title: Always My General
description: Disguised as a man, commander Zhou Chu is betrayed by Xu Hanzhi upon her return. Rescued by rival Shang Kefeng, she becomes Xue Shisan, infiltrating Dengying Tower to uncover the truth and exact revenge.
descriptionAr: Disguised as a man, commander Zhou Chu is betrayed by Xu Hanzhi upon her return. Rescued by rival Shang Kefeng, she becomes Xue Shisan, infiltrating Dengying Tower to uncover the truth and exact revenge.

title: Stealth Walker
description: Police academy student Lin Qiang goes undercover to infiltrate a powerful drug cartel. While gaining the trust of the drug lord’s adopted son, she navigates a dangerous web of deception and betrayal. As law enforcement closes in, she uncovers a shocking truth about her own father, putting her life at even greater risk.
descriptionAr: Police academy student Lin Qiang goes undercover to infiltrate a powerful drug cartel. As law enforcement closes in, she uncovers a shocking truth about her own father, putting her life at even greater risk.

title: Cao Xuanxuan's Love Journey
description: The story unfolds as Zhou Na, a modern-day mystery novelist, finds herself serendipitously transported to ancient Yan City, where she becomes the fiancée of County Magistrate Guo Zijie. Together, they repeatedly solve bizarre cases. As their mutual affection deepens and their bond grows stronger, a sinister conspiracy involving life and death silently emerges...
descriptionAr: The story unfolds as Zhou Na, a modern-day mystery novelist, finds herself serendipitously transported to ancient Yan City, where she becomes the fiancée of County Magistrate Guo Zijie. Together, they repeatedly solve bizarre cases. As their mutual affection deepens and their bond grows stronger, a sinister conspiracy involving life and death silently emerges...

title: Motel California
description: تجتمع شابة من جديد بحبّها الأول لدى عودتها إلى مسقط رأسها الذي هربت منه قبل 12 عامًا، وبتفتّح زهور حبّها الأول تنفتح جراح بالكاد التأمت لـ ماضٍ حاولت الهروب منه.
descriptionAr: تجتمع شابة من جديد بحبّها الأول لدى عودتها إلى مسقط رأسها الذي هربت منه قبل 12 عامًا، وبتفتّح زهور حبّها الأول تنفتح جراح بالكاد التأمت لـ ماضٍ حاولت الهروب منه.

title: Reunion as First Sight
description: Wen Ruyu, a Southern scholar, marries Northern Princess Hai Lanzhen to strengthen ties between their kingdoms, only to uncover a web of secrets and danger. As their lives intertwine through cycles of fate, the two navigate love, betrayal, and sacrifice in a journey to overcome the forces that threaten to tear them apart.
descriptionAr: Wen Ruyu, a Southern scholar, marries Northern Princess Hai Lanzhen to strengthen ties between their kingdoms, only to uncover a web of secrets and danger. As their lives intertwine through cycles of fate, the two navigate love, betrayal, and sacrifice in a journey to overcome the forces that threaten to tear them apart.

title: Towards the Truth
description: Ten years after surviving the massacre of his clan, Shen Song, now a humble chef, is drawn back into his quest for justice when a festival fire uncovers hidden remains. Appointed as the emperor’s civilian investigator, he tackles a series of strange cases, uncovering conspiracies tied to his family’s tragic past.
descriptionAr: Ten years after surviving the massacre of his clan, Shen Song, now a humble chef, is drawn back into his quest for justice when a festival fire uncovers hidden remains. Appointed as the emperor’s civilian investigator, he tackles a series of strange cases, uncovering conspiracies tied to his family’s tragic past.

title: Blind Woman
description: A blind piano tuner is determined to uncover the truth behind her parents' deaths and seek justice for their wrongful fate. Torn between love and vengeance, she defies the odds, navigating darkness and breaking free from destiny to carry out her carefully planned revenge.
descriptionAr: A blind piano tuner is determined to uncover the truth behind her parents' deaths and seek justice for their wrongful fate. Torn between love and vengeance, she defies the odds, navigating darkness and breaking free from destiny to carry out her carefully planned revenge.

title: Love in the Edge of Divorce
description: In a loveless arranged marriage, Fu Yancheng and Sheng Mian plan to divorce.  However, an unexpected intimate encounter leads to deeper misunderstandings when Fu Yancheng discovers that Sheng Mian is actually Penny. Regretting his actions, Fu Yancheng works to win her back

title: I Wanna Hear Your Song
description: A romantic comedy which is about a timpanist witnessing a murder case but cannot remember anything about what happened. With the help from a mysterious guy, she attempts to recover her memories from that day.
descriptionAr: A romantic comedy which is about a timpanist witnessing a murder case but cannot remember anything about what happened. With the help from a mysterious guy, she attempts to recover her memories from that day.

title: Moonlight Mystique
description: Bai Shuo, the youngest daughter of the General's Mansion, aspires to cultivate immortality in order to repay a favor. On her journey to seek immortality, she accidentally rescues the great demon god Fan Yue. As the saying goes, healthy fights strengthen relationships, and they go from mutual manipulation to mutual affection as they fall in love with each other, navigating a love affair intertwined with sweetness and cruelty. Even though they face countless difficulties, their love is strong enough to overcome all limitations, allowing them to truly embrace each other.

title: AARO -All-domain Anomaly Resolution Office-
description: A special investigative unit tackles everything from mysterious disappearances and shadowy figures to eerie supernatural phenomena.
descriptionAr: A special investigative unit tackles everything from mysterious disappearances and shadowy figures to eerie supernatural phenomena.

title: The Queen Who Crowns
description: يصور المسلسل رحلة الحياة الملتهبه للملكة وونج يونج، التي حلمت بعالم جديد في أوائل عهد مملكة جوسون وجعلت زوجها لي بانج وون الملك الثالث، والذي شاركت معه في تأسيس سلطتة الملكية

title: When the Stars Gossip
description: من عالمَين متباعدَين وخلال مهمتَيْن منفصلتَيْن، تتشابك أقدار قائدة فضاء وسائح فضائي في الفضاء، وتشتعل جذوة الحب بينهما.

title: Love Scout
description: يو إيون هو، أب أعزب مسلح بالكمال، يصبح سكرتير كانغ جي يون، الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة شعبية للبحث عن الكفاءات، والذي لا يفعل أي شيء باستثناء العمل.

title: Doctor John
description: دراما طبية تتمحور حول أطباء السيطرة على الآلام، ستصف لنا بحث الأطباء عن الأسباب الغامضة خلف شعور مرضاهم بالألم في صورة بحث مثير، مثل مطاردة المحقق لمجرم في قضية غير محلولة. تشا يو هان طبيب تخدير موهوب صادف أنه أصغر معلم في كلية الطب، وكثيراً ما يُطلق عليه لقب “العشر ثوان” لأن بإمكانه تشخيص مرض الشخص بسرعة كبيرة، بينما..

title: Let Wind Goes By
description: In 2003, a small mining town in Ningxia faces relocation when a burned body appears, echoing an unsolved case from a decade earlier. Veteran detective Chu Zhiqiang teams up with Zhang Tao, a reassigned investigator, to uncover the truth as the town prepares for relocation.
descriptionAr: In 2003, a small mining town in Ningxia faces relocation when a burned body appears, echoing an unsolved case from a decade earlier. Veteran detective Chu Zhiqiang teams up with Zhang Tao, a reassigned investigator, to uncover the truth as the town prepares for relocation.

title: Delightfully Deceitful
description: تدور احداث مسلسل عن (لي رو أوم )محتالة قاسية القلب تجني ثروة ضخم و تجد نفسها متورطة مع المحامي هان مو يونج نقيضها التام بالشخصية والمبادئ والمصاب بتشوهات جسدية.
descriptionAr: تدور احداث مسلسل عن (لي رو أوم )محتالة قاسية القلب تجني ثروة ضخم و تجد نفسها متورطة مع المحامي هان مو يونج نقيضها التام بالشخصية والمبادئ والمصاب بتشوهات جسدية.

title: Cold Blooded Intern
description: A woman in her 40s returns to work as an intern after seven years of being disconnected from work, and starts to endure and survive in a jungle-like society again.
descriptionAr: A woman in her 40s returns to work as an intern after seven years of being disconnected from work, and starts to endure and survive in a jungle-like society again.

title: Angel's Last Mission: Love
description: يُعاقَب ملاك لتدخّله في شؤون البشر، فيُجبَر على تنفيذ مهمّة مستحيلة وهي البحث عن حبيب لراقصة باليه متحجّرة القلب... فكيف سيتحكّم بمشاعرها؟
descriptionAr: يُعاقَب ملاك لتدخّله في شؤون البشر، فيُجبَر على تنفيذ مهمّة مستحيلة وهي البحث عن حبيب لراقصة باليه متحجّرة القلب... فكيف سيتحكّم بمشاعرها؟

title: All That We Loved
description: A love story that covers adolescent teenagers having trouble deciding the gravity of love and friendship.
descriptionAr: A love story that covers adolescent teenagers having trouble deciding the gravity of love and friendship.

title: Zombie Detective
description: تتحدث دراما “المحقق الزومبي” عن “كيم مو يونغ” الذي أصبح زومبي لمدة سنتين. وللعيش، كان يتظاهر كإنسان في القرية. والآن غادر إلى المدينة، هناك أنشأ مكتبا للتحقيقات للعمل كمحقق خاص. “مو يونع” لا يتذكر أي شيء من حياته السابقة قبل أن سصبح زومبي، لذلك يعاني للعيش بين البشر ويسعى لإرجاع ذكرياته. بينما “غونغ سون جي” كانت تشتغل ككاتبة في برنامج شكاوى الشؤون الجارية. حيث قتل أحد الشاهدين لديها في قضية كانت تعمل عليها. وبسبب ذلك استقالت من عملها. فتلتقي بعدها بـ”كيم مو يونغ” وتعمل لديه كعاملة بدوام جزئي في مكتب التحقيقات.

title: While You Were Sleeping
description: تتحدث دراما “بينما كنت نائماً” عن ثلاثة اشخاص يحلمون بما سيحدث لاحقا بالواقع و يسعون الى محاولة وقف المواقف المشئومة من الحدوث و لكن عليهم مواجهة عواقب التغيير الذى سيصنعونه.
descriptionAr: تتحدث دراما “بينما كنت نائماً” عن ثلاثة اشخاص يحلمون بما سيحدث لاحقا بالواقع و يسعون الى محاولة وقف المواقف المشئومة من الحدوث و لكن عليهم مواجهة عواقب التغيير الذى سيصنعونه.

title: Dimension W
description:
Humanity has found a way to achieve infinite energy by using coils to draw it from the fourth plane: dimension "W". With the production of coils having been monopolized by the New Tesla energy company, freelance collectors are hired to find and remove any illegal, unofficial coils.

This is the story of collector Kyōma, who also happens to have a huge hatred towards coils. During one of his missions he stumbles upon a female android that perceives herself as being human, leading the two to enter an unlikely partnership.
descriptionAr:
Humanity has found a way to achieve infinite energy by using coils to draw it from the fourth plane: dimension "W". With the production of coils having been monopolized by the New Tesla energy company, freelance collectors are hired to find and remove any illegal, unofficial coils.

This is the story of collector Kyōma, who also happens to have a huge hatred towards coils. During one of his missions he stumbles upon a female android that perceives herself as being human, leading the two to enter an unlikely partnership.

title: Uncontrollably Fond
description: حين يلتئم شمل هذين العاشقين السابقين بعد سنوات، هو كممثل بارع وهي كمنتجة وثائقيّة، يتّضح أنّ ذكرى انفصالهما المؤلمة لم تبرح ذهنيهما.
descriptionAr: حين يلتئم شمل هذين العاشقين السابقين بعد سنوات، هو كممثل بارع وهي كمنتجة وثائقيّة، يتّضح أنّ ذكرى انفصالهما المؤلمة لم تبرح ذهنيهما.

title: The Veil
description: تحكي عن عميل جهاز المخابرات الوطنية جي هيوك، يختفي فجاة لمدة عام، يعود فجاة بجانب منظمة أجرامية انضم اليها، من أجل للعثور على الخائن المسوؤل عن سقوطة
descriptionAr: تحكي عن عميل جهاز المخابرات الوطنية جي هيوك، يختفي فجاة لمدة عام، يعود فجاة بجانب منظمة أجرامية انضم اليها، من أجل للعثور على الخائن المسوؤل عن سقوطة

title: The Tale of Nokdu
description: تدور أحداث دراما “حكاية نوكدو” في حقبة جوسون حول رجل يتنكر كفتاة لدخول قرية غامضة للنساء فقط. وفتاة لا تريد أن تصبح “كيسينغ”.“جون نوك دو” إبن عائلة نبيلة غير سعيد لأن عائلته تريد أن تزوجه. ليتفادى هذا الزواج، هرب من المنزل، وتنكر كامرأة ودخل قرية خاصة بالنساء الأرامل. وهناك يلتقي بـ”دونغ جو” التي لا تريد أن تصبح كيسينغ، لكنها لا تملك خيارا آخر. تكتشف “دونغ جو” أن “جون نوكدو” رجل فأخبرها سبب قيامه بذلك. وبعد أن ينقدها “نوك دو” من وضعية خطيرة، ستصبح إبنته بالتبني ويقرر أن يعيش في هذه القرية لمدة سنة.

title: Namib
description: تدمرت حياة كانغ سو هيون بعد أن أدى اتهام كاذب إلى طردها من الشركة. إنها تريد العمل مرة أخرى لدعم زوجها وابنهما الذي يعاني من ضعف السمع، وتقوم سو هيون بتجنيد آيدول سابق يو جين وو الذي كان مؤخرًا طبيبًا.
descriptionAr: تدمرت حياة كانغ سو هيون بعد أن أدى اتهام كاذب إلى طردها من الشركة. إنها تريد العمل مرة أخرى لدعم زوجها وابنهما الذي يعاني من ضعف السمع، وتقوم سو هيون بتجنيد آيدول سابق يو جين وو الذي كان مؤخرًا طبيبًا.

title: Thanks, Class Three
description: Born in a cooking family, Cai Cai, the heroine, becomes a member of the third class and meets Liao Yingzi, a “poisonous” gourmet tutor, by a strange chance. She meets Liao Yingzi, a “poisonous” gourmet tutor. Although Liao Yingzi is a harsh critic, he makes her improve without her realizing it, and she hates and admires him at the same time. In the course of their encounters, the two become friends. With the power of cooking, Cai Cai helps her classmates to solve many problems, and with the encouragement of Liao Yingzi, she is able to resolve a long-standing family conflict.

title: The Red Sleeve
description: Based on a novel of the same name, it tells the record of a royal court romance between the King of Joseon who believes his duty is to his country first above love, and a court lady who wants to protect the life she has chosen.

title: The K2
description: يتورّط جندي هارب في مكائد شخصيّة وسياسيّة عندما يعمل كحارس شخصي لدى أسرة مُرشّح رئاسي... تُرى ما علاقته بهذه المكائد؟

title: The Heavenly Idol
description: Pontifex Lembrary fights against a devil, he gets transferred to a different world possessing the body of Woo Yeon-woo who is a member of an unpopular idol group called Wild Animal. In an entertainment business where overwhelming social skills, trendiness, and talents are highly necessary, it is hard for solemn, holy Lembrary to adapt. Due to his inappropriate says and dos as a celebrity, Lembrary is talked about from the public and receives attention that he did not expect. Using his goodness and love, Lembrary heals this twisted and barren world people live in while going this way and that way to settle himself as an idol.

title: The Bride of Habaek
description: حين تفشل مهمّة إله الماء "هابيك" في البحث عن الأحجار المقدّسة في عالم البشر، يطلب المساعدة من طبيبة نفسية مُقدَّر لها أن تخدمه.

title: The Auditors
description: قائد فريق تدقيق مخضرم بمعاونة موظف مُستجد يكشفان عن فساد متفشٍ في شركة إنشاءات.

title: Stealer: The Treasure Keeper
description: دراما كوميدية يتحد فيها سارق أصول ثقافية محجبة "Skunk" وفريق غير رسمي لاسترداد الأصول الثقافية "كارما" ضد أولئك الذين لا يمكن أن يحكم عليهم القانون.

title: Check in Hanyang
description: في أروقة نزل فخم كالقصر، تدور قصص وأسرار لا تنتهي لنزلائه النبلاء وتشرق بينها أحلام 4 شبّان التحقوا بمعهد صارم لتأهليهم للعمل به لكن ما هيَ أسبابهم الخفية يا ترى؟!

title: My Love From The Star
description: Matteo Domingo is an extraterrestrial being that disembarked on the Philippines back in the 16th century during the Spanish Colonial Era. As he ventures to aid a teenage girl, Marcella, from descending off a cliff, he failed to join his trip, the KMT 184.5 comet, back to his planet and is grounded on Earth for the next four centuries and counting. He possesses an almost perfect form, enhanced physical abilities that improves his vision, hearing and speed drastically, and has a rather caustic, jaded point of view with regards to human beings. As time passes by and the story folds on, Matteo is forced to employ a new identity every ten years, as his human appearance never ages.

title: Moorim School
description: The Moorim School isn't focused solely on high academic scores. The school teaches its students virtues including honesty, faith, sacrifice and communication. The teachers and students at the school come from different countries and each have their own stories.
descriptionAr: The Moorim School isn't focused solely on high academic scores. The school teaches its students virtues including honesty, faith, sacrifice and communication. The teachers and students at the school come from different countries and each have their own stories.

title: Reborn Rich
description: After ten years, a loyal employee is framed for embezzlement, then murdered by his employers, only to be reborn as their youngest son, with a yearn for revenge guiding his hostile takeover.
descriptionAr: After ten years, a loyal employee is framed for embezzlement, then murdered by his employers, only to be reborn as their youngest son, with a yearn for revenge guiding his hostile takeover.

title: Perfect Family
description: عائلة تشوي سون هي، التي تبدو سعيدة ومثالية للجميع. ولكن بعد مقتل بارك كيونغ هو، صديق سون هي، يبدأ أفراد العائلة في الشك المتزايد ببعضهم البعض.
descriptionAr: عائلة تشوي سون هي، التي تبدو سعيدة ومثالية للجميع. ولكن بعد مقتل بارك كيونغ هو، صديق سون هي، يبدأ أفراد العائلة في الشك المتزايد ببعضهم البعض.

title: One Ordinary Day
description: A college student gives a young woman he just met a ride to the beach in his father's cab and they end up spending the night together. When he wakes up to find her dead, he gets caught up in her murder case.
descriptionAr: A college student gives a young woman he just met a ride to the beach in his father's cab and they end up spending the night together. When he wakes up to find her dead, he gets caught up in her murder case.

title: The Numbers
description: Four men are assigned to the prison: Jūgo, a man who attempted to break out of prison and ended up extending his jail time; Uno, a man who likes to gamble with women; Rock, a man who likes to get into fights; and Nico, a man who likes anime.
descriptionAr: Four men are assigned to the prison: Jūgo, a man who attempted to break out of prison and ended up extending his jail time; Uno, a man who likes to gamble with women; Rock, a man who likes to get into fights; and Nico, a man who likes anime.

title: Love Song in Winter
description: Since the anesthesiologist Lu Yan “runs into” her dead college friend Deng Man during a night shift, strange things around her occur successively. As the investigation proceeds, the detective Jiang Chengyi, Lu Yan’s ex-boyfriend from many years ago, is embroiled in it, and the long-hidden truth of eight years is gradually revealed.

title: Bloodhounds
description: لسداد ديونهم، يتورط ثلاثة مراهقين شجعان في شباك تجارة إقراض المال بينما يواجهون الأغنياء وأصحاب النفوذ الذين يعيشون على قوت الضعفاء

title: Who Is She
description: جدّة في السبعين من عمرها تتحول في ظروف غامضة إلى شابة في العشرين، فتقرر الاستمتاع بريعان شبابها الذي حرمت منه مُطاردة حلمها في أن تصبح مغنية “آيدول“ وتلتقي بشاب واعد يقع في غرامها .

title: A Love Story of Oiled Paper Umbrella
description: Supreme Court's Nan Fengyi and demon broker Meng Xizhou cross paths through a crime, leading her to apprentice under him as they team up to capture demons. Their growing bond is tested when Meng Xizhou’s inner demon takes control, and Nan Fengyi discovers the demonic core she lost resides within him.

Their growing bond is tested when Meng Xizhou’s inner demon takes control, and Nan Fengyi discovers the demonic core she lost resides within him.

title: Ms. Nirvana
description: After the Fu family's massacre, only the daughter, Fu Zhaoxue survives, but the evidence points to her former lover, Gu Jingzhou. Returning with a new face as Lin Qianyu, she marries into the Gu family to uncover their secrets, reigniting a forbidden romance with Gu Jingzhou. As truths unfold, love and old grudges resurface, leading to an intense rekindling of feelings.

title: Two Foxes
description: Wang Xinyan, a brilliant investment director, infiltrates Minglan Group with a hidden agenda: to avenge the family that destroyed her life. As she seeks justice for her younger brother’s tragic death, her plans take an unexpected turn when she becomes entangled in a turbulent web of love and conflict with Jin Group's heir, Jin Yelei, and his uncle, Jin Xuyan.

title: Sorry Not Sorry
description: تغرق شابة في ديون زواج لم يتمّ بعدما طعنت بسكين الخيانة فيجرفها يأسها إلى بلدة غريبة الأطوار حيث تضطر إلى التنكر كسيدة متزوجة.

title: In The Grip of Love
description: When the smart and capable boss Yu Xiling meets the athletic and energetic student Gu Zhaohe, their first encounter starts with a misunderstanding, sparking mutual teasing and attraction. Who will be the first to give in?
descriptionAr: When the smart and capable boss Yu Xiling meets the athletic and energetic student Gu Zhaohe, their first encounter starts with a misunderstanding, sparking mutual teasing and attraction. Who will be the first to give in?

title: When History Meows
description: "When History Meows" is a historical cartoon based on the history of China, aiming to popularize knowledge of Chinese history to young audiences. 12 plump and cute cats reinterprets the historical events in humorous language.
descriptionAr: "When History Meows" is a historical cartoon based on the history of China, aiming to popularize knowledge of Chinese history to young audiences. 12 plump and cute cats reinterprets the historical events in humorous language.

title: The Legend of TAOTIE
description: The Tianxiang Restaurant in Wuxia Town has a playful shopkeeper Zhu Chengbi who is also a cuisine master, and a bookkeeper Chang Qing who has a magic pen. Zhu Chengbi, a foodie, can make everything with any ingredient, such as minced merman flesh, hornet dumpling, tiger claw bead, spring pastry, fire lotus custard, Wuchang crab, twin mushroom, brotherhood cake and stewed noodles , which indicate human sorrows and joys: love, brotherhood, conjugality, mother and son, family and country crisis... They experience vicissitudes of life together. The two in love are about to have a different destiny. What road will they take?

title: Eternal Rebirths
description: Meng Fan, after succumbing to a terminal illness, finds himself trapped in a year-long cycle of rebirth. On his 1001st rebirth, he breaks free and returns to high school ten years in the past, now armed with infinite knowledge and power to rewrite his regrets.
descriptionAr: Meng Fan, after succumbing to a terminal illness, finds himself trapped in a year-long cycle of rebirth. On his 1001st rebirth, he breaks free and returns to high school ten years in the past, now armed with infinite knowledge and power to rewrite his regrets.

title: Nevertheless: The Shapes of Love
description: بعد انفصال مؤلم، تقطع "ميو" عهدًا على نفسها للتركيز على الفن والابتعاد عن دروب الحب... إلى أن تصادف فنانًا متحفظًا صاحب شخصية جذابة تثير غرائزها.

title: The Night is Still Young
description: Ye Beichen, a powerful prince, is haunted by memories of Shangguan Weiyang, his niece-in-law, whom he failed to protect in their past life. After she killed him in hatred and fell from the city walls, he was left heartbroken and filled with regret. Now obsessed with changing their fate, he is determined to rewrite history and earn a second chance at love. When Shangguan Weiyang is reborn, Ye Beichen seizes her, using his power to control her, driven by an all-consuming love that has turned into madness.

When Shangguan Weiyang is reborn, Ye Beichen seizes her, using his power to control her, driven by an all-consuming love that has turned into madness.

title: The Silent Wife
description: Amnesiac CEO Shen Chiyan unknowingly mistreats his mute wife, Song Qinian, while Shen Chiyan's first love threatens to tear their family apart. As heartbreak and loss mount, Song Qinian finds her voice in a powerful turning point that changes everything.
descriptionAr: Amnesiac CEO Shen Chiyan unknowingly mistreats his mute wife, Song Qinian, while Shen Chiyan's first love threatens to tear their family apart. As heartbreak and loss mount, Song Qinian finds her voice in a powerful turning point that changes everything.

title: Social Savvy Class 101
description: A female student is a social misfit at her high school. She becomes a manager in the anonymous community app Social Butterfly Time. Through this, she learns all the secrets of her classmates. She joins a group in Social Butterfly that she desperately wants to become involved with.
descriptionAr: A female student is a social misfit at her high school. She becomes a manager in the anonymous community app Social Butterfly Time. Through this, she learns all the secrets of her classmates. She joins a group in Social Butterfly that she desperately wants to become involved with.

title: Light Shop
description: المسلسل مقتبس من الرسوم المتحركة الشهيرة التي تحمل نفس الاسم لكانغ فول، ويحكي قصة مجموعة من الغرباء، كل منهم يكافح من أجل التأقلم مع حدث مؤلم في ماضيه. في حياتهم اليومية، ينجذب كل فرد بشكل غامض إلى متجر للضوء يقع في نهاية زقاق قذر. تحت حراسة صاحب متجر غامض، يمكن أن يحمل متجر الضوء مفتاح ماضي الغرباء وحاضرهم ومستقبلهم.

title: Tomorrow and I
description: يقدّم هذا المسلسل رؤية جديدة لـ"تايلاند" وهي تشهد مستقبلًا بائسًا تُغيّر فيه التكنولوجيا ملامح التقاليد والعادات القديمة، ومعها تتكشف التصدعات في النسيج الثقافي.

title: Popeyete & Cute Master
description: Kua Xiao’e, a tough woman with incredible strength, is the descendant of a legendary family with divine powers. Shen Wang, the wealthy but tight-fisted man of Sun Yao City, enlists her as his personal maid and bodyguard after witnessing her abilities. As they go from adversaries to allies, they must work together to fight against the enemy and protect each other.

title: The Tale of Lady Ok
description: تبرز زهرة في عصر جوسون لا تتوانى عن مساعدة الغير لا سيّما في الاستشارات القانونية، وتوقع في شباك حبّها راوي للقصص رحّال ليقرر الاستقرار ومساعدتها بأي ثمن لكن يتّضح أنها تخفي أسرارًا لا تحصى.

title: Brocade Odyssey
description: Ji Yingying, a spirited woman from the Shu brocade, strives to restore her family’s honor and rebuild their legacy. Facing powerful rivals and the looming threat of Nanzhao Kingdom, she joins forces with Yang Jinglan to revive the Shu brocade industry and safeguard its artisans.

title: Love Your Enemy
description: بعد فراق دام لـ 18 يجمع القدر بين شاب وشابة ولدا في نفس اليوم بل ويحملان نفس الاسم لكنها عدوّان لدودان لأجيال، أفلا يُمكن أن يزدهر الحب في الأرض القاحلة؟.

title: The Trunk
description: تلقي حقيبة جرفتها الأمواج المتلاطمة إلى الشاطئ الضوء على خدمة زواج سرّية، ويتضح معها أمر الزواج الغريب بين شخصين متورطين في قلب الأحداث.
descriptionAr: تلقي حقيبة جرفتها الأمواج المتلاطمة إلى الشاطئ الضوء على خدمة زواج سرّية، ويتضح معها أمر الزواج الغريب بين شخصين متورطين في قلب الأحداث.

title: We Are Criminal Police
description: After graduating from the police academy, Qin Chuan and his friends return to their hometown as police officers, determined to pursue their dream of becoming detectives. Despite challenges, Qin Chuan’s career takes off when he proves his courage in a critical situation. Under the guidance of his superiors, he grows into a skilled detective, facing the weight of his responsibilities and the realities of the job.

Despite challenges, Qin Chuan’s career takes off when he proves his courage in a critical situation. Under the guidance of his superiors, he grows into a skilled detective, facing the weight of his responsibilities and the realities of the job.

title: Calling from the Galaxy
description: At opposite ends of the Heavenly River, the Northern and Southern Emperors, rulers of life and death, make a wager during a game of strategy. To test the power of love, they cast the mystical Beidou Orb into the mortal realm, where it must face three lifetimes of trials and tribulations.
descriptionAr: At opposite ends of the Heavenly River, the Northern and Southern Emperors, rulers of life and death, make a wager during a game of strategy. To test the power of love, they cast the mystical Beidou Orb into the mortal realm, where it must face three lifetimes of trials and tribulations.

title: Peace & Love
description: Tao Yao, a goddess charged with protecting the sacred fruit of Guoshen Mountain, is cast down to the mortal realm after losing her divine powers to the mischievous Chang Feng. Reborn as Wang Xiaodie, she endures family betrayal and hardship, only to uncover that the spirit responsible for her downfall now resides within her husband, Fu An.
descriptionAr: Tao Yao, a goddess charged with protecting the sacred fruit of Guoshen Mountain, is cast down to the mortal realm after losing her divine powers to the mischievous Chang Feng. Reborn as Wang Xiaodie, she endures family betrayal and hardship, only to uncover that the spirit responsible for her downfall now resides within her husband, Fu An.

title: The Land of Warriors
description: After the final match of the Continental Advanced Soul Master Academy Elite Tournament, Tang San and his friends reluctantly bid each other farewell, promising to reunite in five years. They then set off on their separate life journeys until Bibi Dong from the Spirit Hall secretly plotted to dominate the Douluo Continent by sweeping away the major sects. In response, Tang San gathered his friends to establish the Tang Sect, committed to the pursuit of justice and determined to shoulder the heavy responsibility.

In response, Tang San gathered his friends to establish the Tang Sect, committed to the pursuit of justice and determined to shoulder the heavy responsibility.

title: When the Phone Rings
description: زواج دام لـ 3 سنوات بين أحد الساسة الواعدين وابنة رجل مرموق بكماء يكسر جموده رنين مكالمات تهديد من مُختطف الزوجة المجهول والذي دوّى كصرخة في الظلام توقظ خفافيش أسراهما الدفينة وتجعله مُحاصر في كابوس لا نهاية له.
descriptionAr: زواج دام لـ 3 سنوات بين أحد الساسة الواعدين وابنة رجل مرموق بكماء يكسر جموده رنين مكالمات تهديد من مُختطف الزوجة المجهول والذي دوّى كصرخة في الظلام توقظ خفافيش أسراهما الدفينة وتجعله مُحاصر في كابوس لا نهاية له.

title: Later, I Laughed
description: At 26, Wu Xiuya has a stable job and a seemingly perfect life with her ambitious boyfriend, Zheng Hao. But after he makes big decisions—her job transfer, proposal, and housing—without consulting her, Wu Xiuya finally speaks up, finding unexpected freedom on stage at a comedy bar. Encouraged by the laughter and support from new friends in stand-up, she discovers a place where she can fully express herself, leading her toward a new chapter.
descriptionAr: At 26, Wu Xiuya has a stable job and a seemingly perfect life with her ambitious boyfriend, Zheng Hao. Encouraged by the laughter and support from new friends in stand-up, she discovers a place where she can fully express herself, leading her toward a new chapter.

title: The Promise of Growing Up Together
description: In the lively town of Luxiang, an ordinary girl, Xia Mi, unexpectedly gains entry to the city’s top high school, where she meets three unique classmates: the outgoing Zhang Ruoxi, the steady top student Fan Yuan, and the kind-hearted Lin Ruolei. Together with a diverse group of friends, they embark on a humorous and heartfelt journey, navigating friendship, family, and first love. As they grow and pursue their dreams, they create an unforgettable story of youth and resilience.
descriptionAr: In the lively town of Luxiang, an ordinary girl, Xia Mi, unexpectedly gains entry to the city’s top high school, where she meets three unique classmates: the outgoing Zhang Ruoxi, the steady top student Fan Yuan, and the kind-hearted Lin Ruolei. Together with a diverse group of friends, they embark on a humorous and heartfelt journey, navigating friendship, family, and first love. As they grow and pursue their dreams, they create an unforgettable story of youth and resilience.

title: Back to 1995
description: Zhang Dabao is a middle-aged man who has lost confidence in life after facing numerous setbacks. When he unexpectedly travels back to 1995 and meets his 22-year-old self, the two embark on a journey filled with challenges that inspire them to join forces. Together, they seek to reconcile past regrets and forge a new beginning in their lives.
descriptionAr: Zhang Dabao is a middle-aged man who has lost confidence in life after facing numerous setbacks. When he unexpectedly travels back to 1995 and meets his 22-year-old self, the two embark on a journey filled with challenges that inspire them to join forces. Together, they seek to reconcile past regrets and forge a new beginning in their lives.

title: Don't Forget Me
description: Nao Kitazawa’s life is good. She is busy working as a doctor at a women’s clinic, and will be getting married in a month to Yuichi Ihara, an older doctor who fits her ideal characteristics of a perfect marriage partner. However, on the day of her move to her new home, she meets Shinji Mamiya, a part-time mover, and is instantly love-struck. After Nao’s aggressive approach, Shinji soon starts to feel the same way. When Nao’s mother, Kaoru, finds out about their mutual feelings, she instantly disapproves saying that their background and level of education are just too different. Just around this time, Nao starts to show signs of early-onset Alzheimer’s disease…

title: Parole Examiner Lee
description: مُحام سابق ينصّب كقاضي الإفراج المشروط، ليكون حائطًا منيعًا يتحتّطم أمامه مؤامرات السجناء الخبيثة، فيتحد مع محققة وديّانة للإيطاح بوريث يحسب أنّه فوق القانون

title: Would You Marry Me?
description: امرأة غريبة الأطوار وسريعة الغضب تنقلب حياتها رأسًا على عقب بعد خيانة خطيبها فتنفصل عنه وخسارة منزلها إثر عملية احتيال، فتقترح زواجًا مزيفًا على رجل يحمل اسم خطيبها السابق لتحافظ على المنزل الفاخر الذي ظفرت به للمتزوجين حديثًا.
descriptionAr: امرأة غريبة الأطوار وسريعة الغضب تنقلب حياتها رأسًا على عقب بعد خيانة خطيبها فتنفصل عنه وخسارة منزلها إثر عملية احتيال، فتقترح زواجًا مزيفًا على رجل يحمل اسم خطيبها السابق لتحافظ على المنزل الفاخر الذي ظفرت به للمتزوجين حديثًا.

title: Ancient Forensic Expert
description: Healer Qu Zhen and Prince Rong Jinsheng join forces to combat a deadly poison spreading through Dasheng. As they face misunderstandings, assassins, and political intrigue, Qu Zhen’s skill and determination are tested. Together, they journey through perilous lands, seeking a cure and uncovering dark secrets that threaten the empire.
descriptionAr: Healer Qu Zhen and Prince Rong Jinsheng join forces to combat a deadly poison spreading through Dasheng. As they face misunderstandings, assassins, and political intrigue, Qu Zhen’s skill and determination are tested. Together, they journey through perilous lands, seeking a cure and uncovering dark secrets that threaten the empire.

title: No More Silence
description: After six years of marriage, Gu Xiaoya has sacrificed her own dreams to be a full-time homemaker for her family. But her husband, Zhou Yang, while appearing caring, is in reality controlling and abusive. Enduring constant mistreatment from both Zhou Yang and her mother-in-law, Gu Xiaoya finally gains the courage to stand up for herself. With support from lawyer Shen Jia, she pursues justice through legal means, reclaiming her rights, holding Zhou Yang accountable, and rediscovering her sense of self.
descriptionAr: After six years of marriage, Gu Xiaoya has sacrificed her own dreams to be a full-time homemaker for her family. But her husband, Zhou Yang, while appearing caring, is in reality controlling and abusive. Enduring constant mistreatment from both Zhou Yang and her mother-in-law, Gu Xiaoya finally gains the courage to stand up for herself. With support from lawyer Shen Jia, she pursues justice through legal means, reclaiming her rights, holding Zhou Yang accountable, and rediscovering her sense of self.

title: Deep Lurk
description: During the Anti-Japanese War, Yun Hongshen unknowingly chases after his father's killer, only to fall into a trap set by "Black Butler," a Japanese spy who had been undercover in China for 15 years. With the help of a close family friend and guidance from the Communist Party, Yun Hongshen joins forces with patriotic youth Wen Yeming to expose the spies hidden within the Nationalist army. Together, they set intricate counter-traps, overcoming personal vendettas to help turn the tide of war.
descriptionAr: During the Anti-Japanese War, Yun Hongshen unknowingly chases after his father's killer, only to fall into a trap set by "Black Butler," a Japanese spy who had been undercover in China for 15 years. Together, they set intricate counter-traps, overcoming personal vendettas to help turn the tide of war.

title: When Fate Plays Matchmaker
description: Madam Zhao Shuangshuang, gifted with the ability to see red strings connecting destined lovers, is Lin’an City’s top matchmaker, dedicated to helping others find love while dreaming of her own. She meets Cheng Yin, a man on a mission to disrupt matchmakers after a personal tragedy. Their opposing goals spark an ongoing rivalry, yet Cheng Yin begins to feel a connection to Zhao Shuangshuang. When an old flame from Zhao Shuangshuang's past reappears, hidden truths emerge, leading both to confront their feelings and pasts as they navigate their growing bond.
descriptionAr: Madam Zhao Shuangshuang, gifted with the ability to see red strings connecting destined lovers, is Lin’an City’s top matchmaker, dedicated to helping others find love while dreaming of her own. title: The Fiery Priest
description: يسعى قسّ حادّ الطباع، لا يستطيع التغاضي عن المظالم، وراء الحقيقة عندما يُفارق زميله رجل الدين الحياة في ظروف غامضة... تُرى ماذا سيكتشف؟

title: Smile Code
description: Gu Yi is a stand-up comedian in Shanghai who juggles a day job and nighttime performances. Her simple goal is to make everyone laugh, but one day she encounters an audience member, Liang Daiwen, who seems immune to her humor. This leads to an unexpected clash between a woman driven by comedy and a man who never laughs.

This leads to an unexpected clash between a woman driven by comedy and a man who never laughs.

title: Mr. Plankton
description: تُجبِر الظروف رجلًا مبتلى بحظه العاثر، وحبيبته السابقة التي توشك على أن تُصبح العروس الأكثر بؤسًا، على مرافقة أحدهما الآخر خلال الرحلة الأخيرة في حياته.

title: Born for the Spotlight
description: يتعين على نساء شغوفات بالتمثيل، ويبحثن عن التميز والفن والشهرة، بذل أقصى جهدهن للسعي وراء أحلامهنّ في عالم الفن الشرس.

title: Money Heist: Korea - Joint Economic Area
description: تركز القصة على مهمة سرقة في منطقة من كوريا حيث سيواجه العصابة عددا من التحديات.

title: Gangnam B-Side
description: مُحقق منبوذ ومدعية شغوفة ووسيط مشبوه ينطلقون للعثور بأي ثمن على فتاة من ملهى ليليّ اختفت في ظروف غامضة بأسرار جوهرية وعلى إثرها ينكشف الوجه الآخر والقبيح لجانجنام المُتستّر تحت الأضواء المتلألئة.

title: Brewing Love
description: قصّة حبّ بين ملكة مبيعات بارعة في إخفاء مشاعرها وبين مالك شركة جعّة مرهف المشاعر وبارع في استشفافها.

title: Don't Come Home
description: يتعين على أمّ مواجهة أسرار مظلمة من الماضي عندما تختفي ابنتها الصغيرة وسط ظروف غامضة، بعد انتقالهما إلى قصر عائلتها القديم والمرعب.

title: The Story of Pearl Girl
description: After narrowly escaping an abusive pearl farm, a young woman with unmatched talent carves out her own fate as treachery meets the world of jewelry.
descriptionAr: After narrowly escaping an abusive pearl farm, a young woman with unmatched talent carves out her own fate as treachery meets the world of jewelry.

title: Love Game in Eastern Fantasy
description: Pulled into the pages of a fantasy novel, a woman is shocked to find herself stuck in the role of a villain. Now, she must battle to rewrite her destiny.
descriptionAr: Pulled into the pages of a fantasy novel, a woman is shocked to find herself stuck in the role of a villain. Now, she must battle to rewrite her destiny.

title: The Fevengers
description: After a kidnapping, jewelry heiress Wen Ruojun discovers that her husband, Gu Yancheng, not only cheated on her with her best friend but also masterminded their marriage as a scheme to steal her wealth. Awakening to the truth, Wen Ruojun joins forces with fellow victim Lin Jiayi. Together, they unite with other survivors to launch a fierce plan of revenge against Gu Yancheng.
descriptionAr: After a kidnapping, jewelry heiress Wen Ruojun discovers that her husband, Gu Yancheng, not only cheated on her with her best friend but also masterminded their marriage as a scheme to steal her wealth. Awakening to the truth, Wen Ruojun joins forces with fellow victim Lin Jiayi. Together, they unite with other survivors to launch a fierce plan of revenge against Gu Yancheng.

title: Our Golden Days
description: تدور القصة حول "لي جي هيوك"، الرجل الناجح الذي يبدو وكأنه يملك كل شيء، لكن حياته المثالية تنهار فجأة، مما يجبره على إعادة اكتشاف معنى السعادة الحقيقية. إلى جانبه تقف "جي أون أو"، الفتاة المشرقة التي لم تتخلَ عنه رغم رفضه لمشاعرها سابقًا، وصديقه "بارك سيونغ جاي"، الذي يعاني من صراع داخلي بين ولائه لصديقه ومشاعره الخاصة. يستعرض المسلسل رحلة هؤلاء الثلاثة وهم يتنقلون بين تحديات الحياة، والحب، والصداقة.
descriptionAr: تدور القصة حول "لي جي هيوك"، الرجل الناجح الذي يبدو وكأنه يملك كل شيء، لكن حياته المثالية تنهار فجأة، مما يجبره على إعادة اكتشاف معنى السعادة الحقيقية. إلى جانبه تقف "جي أون أو"، الفتاة المشرقة التي لم تتخلَ عنه رغم رفضه لمشاعرها سابقًا، وصديقه "بارك سيونغ جاي"، الذي يعاني من صراع داخلي بين ولائه لصديقه ومشاعره الخاصة. يستعرض المسلسل رحلة هؤلاء الثلاثة وهم يتنقلون بين تحديات الحياة، والحب، والصداقة.

title: Fangs of Fortune
description:
During the Zhenyuan era, the accidental death of the Bai Ze goddess, who governed both human and demon realms, leads to chaos as demon beasts run rampant. Disguised as Zhao Yuanzhou, the demon leader Zhu Yan offers to form a demon-hunting bureau to help restore order.

Wen Xiao, suspicious of Zhao Yuanzhou, joins the bureau along with her childhood friend Zhuo Yichen, skilled archer Pei Sijing, and the talented but timid doctor Bai Jiu. Together, they confront the creatures from "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" and uncover the darker truths behind the chaos.
descriptionAr:
During the Zhenyuan era, the accidental death of the Bai Ze goddess, who governed both human and demon realms, leads to chaos as demon beasts run rampant. Disguised as Zhao Yuanzhou, the demon leader Zhu Yan offers to form a demon-hunting bureau to help restore order.

Wen Xiao, suspicious of Zhao Yuanzhou, joins the bureau along with her childhood friend Zhuo Yichen, skilled archer Pei Sijing, and the talented but timid doctor Bai Jiu. Together, they confront the creatures from "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" and uncover the darker truths behind the chaos.

title: Mistaken Love
description: In the 15th year of Qingshuo, Princess Li Conghuan of Zizhou marries Crown Prince Mo Heng, but her true motive is revenge. Once in love with the Second Prince, Mo Jin, she witnessed the brutal murder of her mother and her newborn child. Returning to the palace, Li Conghuan is determined to avenge their deaths, but her former love, now the Crown Princess' husband, struggles to believe she would go to such lengths for power. Caught in a web of assassination attempts and suspicion, the two must navigate misunderstandings and hidden intentions as their paths intertwine once more.

title: Hellbound
description: تُصدر كائنات من عالم آخر أحكامًا دموية وترسل أشخاصًا إلى الجحيم، ممّا يتسبب في ظهور جماعة دينية مُتأسّسة على فكرة العدالة الإلهية.
descriptionAr: تُصدر كائنات من عالم آخر أحكامًا دموية وترسل أشخاصًا إلى الجحيم، ممّا يتسبب في ظهور جماعة دينية مُتأسّسة على فكرة العدالة الإلهية.

title: Light of My Lion
description: يعترض ظهور طفل صغير غامض الحياة الهادئة الرتيبة التي يتشاركها فنان مصاب بالتوحد مع شقيقه الأكبر العطوف.
descriptionAr: يعترض ظهور طفل صغير غامض الحياة الهادئة الرتيبة التي يتشاركها فنان مصاب بالتوحد مع شقيقه الأكبر العطوف.

title: Like a Dragon: Yakuza
description: تدور أحداث القصة في البلدة الخيالية "كاموروتشو" عبر خطي زمن متقاطعين، عام 1995 و2005. في عام 1995، يسعى أربعة أصدقاء للهروب من حياتهم المقيدة في دار الأيتام ويغوصون في العالم السفلي الذي تسيطر عليه "الياكوزا" في "كاموروتشو". بينما في عام 2005، تتفكك صداقتهم، إذ تصل التوترات بين عشيرة "توجو" وتحالف "أومي" إلى نقطة الغليان، مما يعمق الفجوة بينهم ويؤدي إلى تصاعد الصراع.
descriptionAr: تدور أحداث القصة في البلدة الخيالية "كاموروتشو" عبر خطي زمن متقاطعين، عام 1995 و2005. في عام 1995، يسعى أربعة أصدقاء للهروب من حياتهم المقيدة في دار الأيتام ويغوصون في العالم السفلي الذي تسيطر عليه "الياكوزا" في "كاموروتشو". بينما في عام 2005، تتفكك صداقتهم، إذ تصل التوترات بين عشيرة "توجو" وتحالف "أومي" إلى نقطة الغليان، مما يعمق الفجوة بينهم ويؤدي إلى تصاعد الصراع.

title: Dawn Amidst Hidden Clouds
description: Lan Che, a tough street girl defending her neighborhood, becomes entangled in a murder investigation and crosses paths with Lou Mingye, the head of the Dali Court. Though they initially clash, they gradually clear up their differences and join forces to solve cases. As their relationship deepens, Lan Che, with Lou Mingye's support, begins to pursue her dreams and transforms her life.
descriptionAr: Lan Che, a tough street girl defending her neighborhood, becomes entangled in a murder investigation and crosses paths with Lou Mingye, the head of the Dali Court. Though they initially clash, they gradually clear up their differences and join forces to solve cases. As their relationship deepens, Lan Che, with Lou Mingye's support, begins to pursue her dreams and transforms her life.

title: A Beautiful Lie
description: يتوجه فريق إنقاذ طبي ومتطوعون، بمن فيهم الممثلة تشين فاي، إلى منطقة الكوارث في جنوب غرب الصين. في البداية، شككت تشين فاي في دوافعها، لكنها أثبتت نفسها من خلال المخاطرة بحياتها لإنقاذ الآخرين. أثناء عملهم معًا، أدركت كابتن الفريق Xing Zhizhi مرونتها، وأصبحوا أقرب. أدركت Qin Fei لاحقًا أن Xing Zhizhi كان الطبيب الذي أنقذها في حادث سابق، وربط مصائرهم. معًا، يدعمون بعضهم البعض أثناء متابعة حياتهم المهنية

title: This World Is Not Real
description: After a car accident, game designer Qing Wan falls into a coma. Her fiancé, Lin Xian, CEO of a gaming company, tries to revive her by connecting her consciousness to a simulation called "Dreamscape." As Qing Wan slowly regains her memories, they face growing threats from Lin Xian's rival, who seeks to steal the technology, endangering both the real and dream worlds.
descriptionAr: After a car accident, game designer Qing Wan falls into a coma. Her fiancé, Lin Xian, CEO of a gaming company, tries to revive her by connecting her consciousness to a simulation called "Dreamscape." As Qing Wan slowly regains her memories, they face growing threats from Lin Xian's rival, who seeks to steal the technology, endangering both the real and dream worlds.

title: The Killer Bride
description: Las Espadas is a superstitious town that has been haunted by the ghost of The Killer Bride for years. Almost all Las Espadas residents have stories of encountering the woman in the bloody wedding dress and veil. They say that the ghost is biding her time to exact revenge on the people who had hurt her in the past.
